sentence.Network_en: He reacted testily to reports that he'd opposed military involvement.
sentence.Network_cn: 有报道称他反对军队参与，对此他很是恼火。

entry.tran: 急躁的;没耐心的;易怒的
entry.def: If you describe someone as testy, you mean that they easily become impatient or angry.

example.ex: Ben's getting a little testy in his old age.
example.tran: 上了年纪后本变得有点性急了。

auth_sentence.content: "I would think that everyone would know how to spell their own real name," he wrote testily.
auth_sentence.res_content: "I would think that everyone would know how to spell their own real name," he wrote testily.
